name: Bask In The Sunlight
effect: Awaken up to two Beasties you control that have a ["Woodlands"] or ["Daytime"] Terra Bonus. Until the end of the next turn, Beasties affected by this Spell cannot declare Attacks or be declared as a Defender.
description: Free to be one with the Wilderness. Time to soak up the sun.
note: Silver COLLECTOR stamp limited to 20. Given away to fans at Dallas Collect-a-con 2025. Bask in the Sunlight is said to be Charlie Hurlocker's favorite MetaZoo card. This promo is a nod to when Charlie himself released an unofficial COLLECTOR stamp Dragon Majesty Charizard card in 2018.
